## JSONElement type

`JSONElement` is a wrapper for `CRDTElement` that provides users with an easy-to-use interface for manipulating `Document`<!-- -->s.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type JSONElement<T = unknown, A = unknown> = PrimitiveValue | JSONObject<T> | JSONArray<T> | Text<A> | Counter;
```
<b>References:</b> [PrimitiveValue](./yorkie-js-sdk.primitivevalue.md)<!-- -->, [JSONObject](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonobject.md)<!-- -->, [JSONArray](./yorkie-js-sdk.jsonarray.md)<!-- -->, [Counter](./yorkie-js-sdk.counter.md)
